file_content.text: Mandalore, your champion presents himself.
Glad a little war wasn't enough to keep you from meeting me, champion.
I like a man who's not afraid to get his knuckles bloody.
I like a woman who's not afraid to get her knuckles bloody.
Welcome aboard the Spirit of Vengeance, both of you.
Welcome aboard the Spirit of Vengeance, champion.
You wanted to see me about something?
Why did you call for me?
I'm humbled, truly.
Don't think I can't spot a man sizing me up, Devaronian.
That goes for me as well.
I was expecting a lot more fanfare.
I'm not impressed.
Probably not the best place for bravado, champ--just saying.
Your friend's a sly one; he's been eyeing every angle in the room since you walked in.
Gault's definitely a lot more dangerous than he looks.
He has his uses.
Don't listen to her. She's just trying to make sure you shoot me first if things go south.
Don't listen to him. He's just trying to make sure you shoot me first if things go south.
Just looking for the nearest exit.
Probably trying to escape.
No, I was looking for all the exits, thank you very much.
Could you please not ruin this?
This must be Mako. I've heard she's the brains behind your operation.
Now that we've been introduced, you plan on telling us why we're here?
We done with the small talk?
Mako is more than capable.
She knows her stuff.
She's nobody. Can we move along?
Never mind her.
Hey, I'm not "Grand Champion," but I think I earned my right to be here.
The Great Hunt cost you a lot, I understand. Those sacrifices haven't gone unnoticed.
The Huntmaster's accolades not enough for you?
I've got a lot to thank you for. Shoring up that secret auction, avenging Hedarr Soongh, stopping that arrogant snot Tarro Blood....
You had a good slog getting here. Says a lot that you aced Tarro Blood without stooping to his level, a damn lot.
You brought me all this way to talk about Tarro Blood?
I don't care about Blood.
You're here because you won the Great Hunt.
He was never any threat to me.
I'm too good to cheat.
That doesn't mean he was harmless. He could have cost us a lot.
He'd have failed one way or another.
You give him too much credit.
Maybe so, but a Great Hunt without a victor is no cause for celebration.
The Great Hunt isn't held for the sake of sport; it's meant to find the best the galaxy has to offer. Usually to handle a task vital to the Mando'ade.
I have one more thing to ask of you before I know you're the one for it.
You have my full attention, Mandalore.
Go ahead.
How'd I know this wasn't just a social call?
I expected as much.
Thought I'd bore you with tales of my glorious youth? Mandalorians prefer to inspire tales, not tell them.
I won the Great Hunt. I haven't got anything to prove.
I'm already number one.
Wrong. Grand Champions are rare, but you are not singular. You must distinguish yourself.
There is a cavern in the deep jungles of Dromund Kaas, unnatural place, filled with all kind of abominations.
There's something down there nobody's laid eyes on and lived to brag about it. I want you to kill it.
I'll head for Dromund Kaas now.
I'll do it.
If the creature's brood are any measure, it just might be.
I'm not interested in doing you any favors.
I'm not working for free.
Glory is its own reward, hunter... but don't worry, you'll have your spoils.
My clans send their most promising warriors to bloody themselves on the beasts in the cavern. Head to their camp at these coordinates.
We'll speak again when you've brought me a suitable trophy.
Nice safari vacation you won, champ. Next time, take the cash prize.
As if Dromund Kaas didn't already give me the creeps. Come on, let's go show this thing how scary you can be.
Mandalore, your champion presents herself.
Mandalore's waiting. This way.
You've entered Mandalorian controlled space. Vacate the sector before we use you for target practice. You have two minutes.
Lek told me my presence was requested.
I'm expected.
I don't think you know who you're talking to.
Hold on a second.
That'd be the last mistake you ever made.
Careful who you threaten.
I'm the victor of the Great Hunt. Here to see Mandalore.
Apologies, champion. I'll clear you for landing.
The pleasure is mine.
This'll be easy.
